name: Trailblaze: Friendship Is Magic!
description: The gray friend you once met in dreams has come alone to the real world of Belobog. He has arrived to resolve a crisis involving unknown shadows attacking residents, but he urgently needs your help and that of your companions...
introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
The gray friend you once met in dreams has come alone to the real world of Belobog. He has arrived to resolve a crisis involving unknown shadows attacking residents, but he urgently needs your help and that of your companions...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● After the event starts, there will be a new trial stage daily, up to 5 stages.
● Each challenge stage has two difficult levels: Initiation Trial and Official Trial. After completing the Initiation Trials, the Official Trial difficulty level will be unlocked.
● In this trial, Trailblazers can only use designated trial characters or the same characters that Trailblazers have obtained to participate.
● Increasing the Equilibrium Level will also increase enemy levels.

◆ Gameplay Intro ◆
● In each trial phase, different characters will play the role of the Magician, summoning Minicans with different abilities to fight side by side.
● The Magician's Skill and Ultimate will have entirely new battle effects, commanding the Minicans in combat.
● Minicans possess new Attack and Talent abilities, offering diverse combat experiences.
● In the Official Trial difficulty, completing specified combo skill objectives and defeating designated waves of enemies before the Cycle ends will earn evaluations for Star Rewards.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event period, rewards can be claimed via Bucket Rewards upon achieving specific challenge goals within the stages.
